name: Draft Day Sports: Pro Golf
description: Prepare for your journey to becoming one of golf's all-time greats in this career based golf game. Choose one of six tours to start on and develop your golfer as you battle the rest of the tour for the tournament cup chases or just to stay alive on the tour without going broke!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP/Vista/Win7/Win8.X/Win10 Processor: Intel or AMD, 32 bit or 64 bit Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: 1280 x 768 display capable of running 32-bit color or higher Storage: 250 MB available space
